name: I know he did it
description:
This game was made 2020 Unreal Spring Jam, and the theme for the jam was "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw".

Every thing in the game was made by me within the jam. I have used the following software to make the game:

  • Unreal engine 4.25.1
  • Blender
  • Inkscape
  • GIMP
  • Audacity
  • LMMS

Good luck and have fun playing the game
